p%3A%201px%20solid%20%23777%3B%0Amargin%3A%2028px%200%3B%0A%7D%0Adl%20%7B%0Amargin%2Dleft%3A%200%3B%0A%7D%0Adl%20dd%20%7B%0Amargin%2Dbottom%3A%2013px%3B%0Amargin%2Dleft%3A%2013px%3B%0A%7D%0Adl%20dt%20%7B%0Afont%2Dweight%3A%20bold%3B%0A%7D%0Aul%20%7B%0Amargin%2Dtop%3A%200%3B%0A%7D%0Aul%20li%20%7B%0Alist%2Dstyle%3A%20circle%20outside%3B%0A%7D%0Aul%20ul%20%7B%0Amargin%2Dbottom%3A%200%3B%0A%7D%0Apre%2C%20code%20%7B%0Abackground%2Dcolor%3A%20%23f7f7f7%3B%0Aborder%2Dradius%3A%203px%3B%0Acolor%3A%20%23333%3B%0Awhite%2Dspace%3A%20pre%2Dwrap%3B%20%0A%7D%0Apre%20%7B%0Aborder%2Dradius%3A%203px%3B%0Amargin%3A%205px%200px%2010px%200px%3B%0Apadding%3A%2010px%3B%0A%7D%0Apre%3Anot%28%5Bclass%5D%29%20%7B%0Abackground%2Dcolor%3A%20%23f7f7f7%3B%0A%7D%0Acode%20%7B%0Afont%2Dfamily%3A%20Consolas%2C%20Monaco%2C%20%27Courier%20New%27%2C%20monospace%3B%0Afont%2Dsize%3A%2085%25%3B%0A%7D%0Ap%20%3E%20code%2C%20li%20%3E%20code%20%7B%0Apadding%3A%202px%200px%3B%0A%7D%0Adiv%2Efigure%20%7B%0Atext%2Dalign%3A%20center%3B%0A%7D%0Aimg%20%7B%0Abackground%2Dcolor%3A%20%23FFFFFF%3B%0Apadding%3A%202px%3B%0Aborder%3A%201px%20solid%20%23DDDDDD%3B%0Aborder%2Dradius%3A%203px%3B%0Aborder%3A%201px%20solid%20%23CCCCCC%3B%0Amargin%3A%200%205px%3B%0A%7D%0Ah1%20%7B%0Amargin%2Dtop%3A%200%3B%0Afont%2Dsize%3A%2035px%3B%0Aline%2Dheight%3A%2040px%3B%0A%7D%0Ah2%20%7B%0Aborder%2Dbottom%3A%204px%20solid%20%23f7f7f7%3B%0Apadding%2Dtop%3A%2010px%3B%0Apadding%2Dbottom%3A%202px%3B%0Afont%2Dsize%3A%20145%25%3B%0A%7D%0Ah3%20%7B%0Aborder%2Dbottom%3A%202px%20solid%20%23f7f7f7%3B%0Apadding%2Dtop%3A%2010px%3B%0Afont%2Dsize%3A%20120%25%3B%0A%7D%0Ah4%20%7B%0Aborder%2Dbottom%3A%201px%20solid%20%23f7f7f7%3B%0Amargin%2Dleft%3A%208px%3B%0Afont%2Dsize%3A%20105%25%3B%0A%7D%0Ah5%2C%20h6%20%7B%0Aborder%2Dbottom%3A%201px%20solid%20%23ccc%3B%0Afont%2Dsize%3A%20105%25%3B%0A%7D%0Aa%20%7B%0Acolor%3A%20%230033dd%3B%0Atext%2Ddecoration%3A%20none%3B%0A%7D%0Aa%3Ahover%20%7B%0Acolor%3A%20%236666ff%3B%20%7D%0Aa%3Avisited%20%7B%0Acolor%3A%20%23800080%3B% <body>




<h1 class="title toc-ignore">FNGr</h1>
<h4 class="author"><em>Ben Williams</em></h4>
<h4 class="date"><em>2018-05-11</em></h4>



<div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span class="kw">library</span>(FNGr)
<span class="kw">library</span>(tidyverse)
<span class="kw">library</span>(scales)
<span class="kw">theme_set</span>(<span class="kw">theme_sleek</span>())

<span class="kw">data.frame</span>(<span class="dt">year =</span> <span class="dv">1973</span><span class="op">:</span><span class="dv">2017</span>, <span class="dt">age =</span> <span class="dv">1</span><span class="op">:</span><span class="dv">5</span>) <span class="op">%&gt;%</span>
<span class="st">  </span><span class="kw">mutate</span>(<span class="dt">y =</span> <span class="kw">rnorm</span>(<span class="kw">n</span>(), <span class="dv">10</span>,<span class="dv">5</span>)) -&gt;<span class="st"> </span>df</code></pre></div>
<p>The basic ggplot figure spaces years about every 5-10, depending on the timeseries length.</p>
<div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span class="kw">ggplot</span>(df, <span class="kw">aes</span>(year, age, <span class="dt">size =</span> y)) <span class="op">+</span><span class="st"> </span><span class="kw">geom_point</span>()  <span class="op">+</span><span class="st"> </span><span class="kw">scale_size_area</span>()</code></pre></div>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," /><!-- --> This makes for a rather poor axis, for our typical presentation needs. We can clean this up somewhat by using breaks or the pretty_breaks function from the scales package</p>
<div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span class="kw">ggplot</span>(df, <span class="kw">aes</span>(year, age, <span class="dt">size =</span> y)) <span class="op">+</span><span class="st"> </span><span class="kw">geom_point</span>() <span class="op">+</span><span class="st"> </span><span class="kw">scale_size_area</span>() <span class="op">+</span>
<span class="st">    </span><span class="kw">scale_x_continuous</span>(<span class="dt">breaks =</span> <span class="kw">seq</span>(<span class="dv">1973</span>, <span class="dv">2016</span>, <span class="dv">3</span>))</code></pre></div>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," /><!-- --></p>
<div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r">
<span class="kw">ggplot</span>(df, <span class="kw">aes</span>(year, age, <span class="dt">size =</span> y)) <span class="op">+</span><span class="st"> </span><span class="kw">geom_point</span>() <span class="op">+</span>
<span class="st">  </span><span class="kw">scale_x_continuous</span>(<span class="dt">breaks =</span> <span class="kw">pretty_breaks</span>(<span class="dt">n =</span> <span class="dv">15</span>))</code></pre></div>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," /><!-- --> However this does not show a tick for each year, something that has been regularly requested. tickr will add a tick mark to each year and provide a label for the interval designated.</p>
<p>Labels every 10 years.</p>
<div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r">xaxis =<span class="st"> </span><span class="kw">tickr</span>(df, year, <span class="dv">10</span>)
yaxis =<span class="st"> </span><span class="kw">tickr</span>(df, age, <span class="dv">2</span>)

<span class="kw">ggplot</span>(df, <span class="kw">aes</span>(year, age, <span class="dt">size =</span> y)) <span class="op">+</span><span class="st"> </span><span class="kw">geom_point</span>() <span class="op">+</span>
<span class="st">  </span><span class="kw">scale_x_continuous</span>(<span class="dt">breaks =</span> xaxis<span class="op">$</span>breaks, <span class="dt">labels =</span> xaxis<span class="op">$</span>labels) <span class="op">+</span>
<span class="st">  </span><span class="kw">scale_y_continuous</span>(<span class="dt">breaks =</span> yaxis<span class="op">$</span>breaks, <span class="dt">labels =</span> yaxis<span class="op">$</span>labels)</code></pre></div>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," /><!-- --></p>
